title: A Faster Python Scoring Function
description: A Better Scoring FunctionInspired by this R scoring function from Vicens Gaitan I implemented a scoring function in Python.  On my machine it runs 3 times faster than the one from trackml package.  On Kalggle kernels it is about 4x faster than the trackml one. I reused part of this notebook as a starting point.
description_lemmatized: better scoring functioninspired r scoring function vicens gaitan implemented scoring function python machine run 3 time faster one trackml package kalggle kernel 4x faster trackml one reused part notebook starting point
